artefact: Search for property information from the Land Registry

artefact.overview: Find a property and get its title plan, find out who owns it by downloading the title register and see if it's at risk of flooding on the Land Registry website
artefact.more_information:
##Title plan

A title plan shows the property's [general boundaries](/changing-your-propertys-boundary). You can download a copy for £4.

##Title register

This shows who currently owns the property, how much they bought it for (if bought after April 2000) and any rights of way or restrictions on the way the land can be used. You can download a copy for £4.

##Flood Risk Indicator

This report costs £9 plus VAT and estimates how likely the property is to flood in the future.
artefact.introduction: Find information about a property, even if you don't own it. Search by address to find the owner, how far its general boundaries extend and whether it's likely to be a flood risk.
expectations: Available in England and Wales only

details.description: Applying for planning permission, conservation areas and planning decisions
Your legal obligations and rights when renting, buying or owning a home, plus information about Council Tax, what to do if you're homeless and where to get help if you have a housing dispute.

artefact.title: Registering land or property with Land Registry
